root.message: The SDG_TARGET field for indicator 3-b-2, translated into en
root.data: 3.b Support research and development of vaccines and drugs against diseases, communicable or not, which mainly affect the inhabitants of developing countries, provide affordable access to essential drugs and vaccines, in accordance with the Declaration Doha Round of the Agreement on Trade-Related Aspects of Intellectual Property Rights (TRIPS) and Public Health, which reaffirms the right of developing countries to take full advantage of the flexibility provisions of this agreement when it comes to protecting public health and, in particular, ensuring universal access to medicines
